item.description:
UPDATE:  Happy Holidays..  I made a reservation at Chau Chau City at 83 Essex street.  I will be outside the movie theatre afterwards..Looking forward..

 

what a perfect day to check out a new movie together... Given its a holiday, I thought we would stroll to Chinatown for our discussion.. more detail on that too follow...


In June 1939, the reigning British king (Samuel West) and queen (Olivia Colman) visit President (Bill Murray) and Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt (Olivia Williams) at their New York home. War with Germany looms on the horizon, and England desperately needs the president's support. An unforgettable weekend unfolds as FDR tries to juggle international affairs with the complexities of his domestic arrangement, as seen through the eyes of Daisy (Laura Linney), the president's intimate confidant.

  • Cast: Bill Murray , Laura Linney, Samuel West, Olivia Colman, Elizabeth Marvel, Olivia Williams
  • Director: Roger Michell
  • Genres: Drama

 

Here's a link to buy tickets... http://www.fandango.com/hydeparkonhudson_153168/movietimes?location=02130&date=12%2f25%2f2012

 

As John would say..

See you at the movies..

Diane
item.how_to_find_us: Diane will wait in the hall outside of the door the movie is playing. Then off to Chinatown..
item.name: Hyde Park on Hudson
